awd_titl_txt: A Multimedia Environment for Teaching Data Analysis         Concepts
awd_abstract_narration: Sammis    The goals of the project are twofold, in keeping with the strategy of concurrently developing a process and a prototype product.  First, at the technical level, the project aims to develop a stable of programs and software to coordinate them, a library of video examples, a collection of datasets, a pool of exercises, and a base curriculum from which first-rank introductory statistics courses can be developed.    Secondly, the project aims to prove the process by developing a prototype introductory elementary statistics course.  The course would be sufficient for a full test in which students would take the entire introductory course from a multimedia workstation.  At the pedagogical level, the project aims to develop a coherent design for multimedia statistics courses to meet the challenge of integrating text, illustration, video, animation, simulation, data visualization, and computation.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Technology, Innovation, and Partnerships
